00551    /*

00625    /*
00626    * Is this a mutable species?
00627    */
00628    inline bool Species::isMutable() const
00629    {  return (mutatorPtr_ != 0); }
00630 
00631    /*
00632    * Get associated mutator object.
00633    */
00634    inline SpeciesMutator& Species::mutator()
00635    {
00636       assert(mutatorPtr_);  
00637       return *mutatorPtr_; 
00638    }
